name: Cap-Man: The Cappening
description:
This is my entry for the GDL PacMan game jam.

120 Caps to collect
4 Power Ups
4 Floppies to avoid

Controls
Arrows/WASD/Left Stick to move
Space/A Button to jump

Try not to die.

View all the submissions.

http://gamedevleague.com/topic/96/intro-to-the-pac...
